content: Civil Grand Jury | San Francisco Skip to main content English Español 中文 Filipino Civil Grand Jury We scrutinize the conduct of public business and investigate operations of the City and County of San Francisco. Services File a complaint about City agencies or officials You can submit a complaint about a San Francisco City department or official. “Sunset over City Hall” by Sergio Ruiz , CC BY 2023-2024 Civil Grand Jury Reports See the Jury's research, investigation, findings, and recommendations. See report Resources Past reports Civil Grand Jury Reports 2022-2023 Civil Grand Jury Reports 2021-2022 Civil Grand Jury Reports 2020-2021 Reports prior to 2020 Previous reports from 1995 to 2020. Status of recommendations Status of Civil Grand Jury Recommendations About The Civil Grand Jury is comprised of 19 members who serve for a period of 1 year, from July through June 30 the following year. Members are selected at random from a pool of 30 prospective grand jurors. During the term, grand jurors serve a minimum of approximately 500 hours. Learn more about us Request public records Email cgrandjury@sftc.org to submit a request. You must have JavaScript enabled to use this form. Was this page helpful?
